content.rendered:
Fury Road Zombie Crash is a 3D game about driving a modified automobile across a zombie-infested landscape. It’s enjoyable and addicting, and it came just in time for the apocalypse. In order to remain alive in the face of a zombie apocalypse, you must pilot your preferred vehicle while avoiding the undead. Keep going, race your war vehicle throughout the arena, and annihilate the undead. You can play this and similar games for free on kiz10.com.
You need to drive your car and drift tokill the zombies. Controls: Use W A S D to moveyour car and space to handbrake. Also you have N button for nitro.As for mobile, controls are on screen.
